proposal1.heroHeadline: Lesia is losing 300 hours a year on proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting a user-focused proposal takes hours. Automate this to just 47 seconds with our AI.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are ongoing losses draining Lesia's resources.

problems.title: Wasted Design Time
problems.description: Spending 10 hours a week on proposals is 10 hours not spent designing. That's 520 hours a year lost.

problems.title: Missed Client Opportunities
problems.description: Each day spent on proposals is a day potential clients are not reached. This could mean losing 50 potential clients annually.

problems.title: Revenue Leakage
problems.description: Every hour spent writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This equates to $15,000 in lost revenue yearly.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistency. Inconsistent branding can confuse clients, costing potential projects.

problems.title: High Stress Levels
problems.description: Long proposal processes increase stress, reducing productivity. This stress could lead to burnout, costing $5,000 in productivity losses.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Taking days to finalize a proposal means losing out to quicker competitors. This delay could cost 10% of potential contracts.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these inefficiencies with a seamless process.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system completes them in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Manually crafted proposals risk inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal is perfectly branded and consistent.

solutions.title: Time Savings
solutions.description: Current method consumes valuable hours. Our AI frees up 300 hours annually for creative work.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Engagement
solutions.description: Slow responses leave clients waiting. Our system's speed means immediate engagement and faster follow-ups.

solutions.title: Revenue Growth
solutions.description: Lost hours mean lost revenue. Our AI redirects time towards revenue-generating activities, boosting profits.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Lesia.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Online Presence by Prioritizing User Experience
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Partner with Lesia to redesign your digital touchpoints, ensuring beauty and accessibility for all users.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every missed opportunity on your site is potential revenue slipping away.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: A high bounce rate means visitors are leaving without engaging, leading to potential losses of up to 30% in conversions.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: 60% of your users may experience frustration on mobile, resulting in decreased customer satisfaction and loyalty.

problems.title: Lack of Visual Appeal
problems.description: An outdated design can turn away potential clients, costing you up to 25% of potential leads.

problems.title: Complex Navigation
problems.description: Complex navigation leads to user confusion, reducing time spent on site and potentially costing 20% of sales.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: A one-second delay in page load time can result in a 7% reduction in conversions.

problems.title: Inaccessible Content
problems.description: Inaccessible content can alienate up to 15% of users, missing out on a significant audience.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions are designed to directly address these losses.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site with a focus on user experience and aesthetics, reducing bounce rates and increasing engagement.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Ensure seamless mobile interactions, improving satisfaction and retention rates.

solutions.title: Performance Enhancement
solutions.description: Improve load times to boost conversions and user satisfaction.

solutions.title: Accessibility Design
solutions.description: Make your content accessible to all, expanding your audience and improving user experience.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Here's why Lesia is the perfect partner for you.

whyUsCards.title: Design Excellence
whyUsCards.description: We focus on creating visually stunning designs that captivate and engage users.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies deliver measurable improvements in user engagement and conversions.

whyUsCards.title: Partnership Approach
whyUsCards.description: We see ourselves as an extension of your team, working together towards your goals.

whyUsCards.title: Inclusive Design
whyUsCards.description: Our commitment to accessibility ensures that your site is usable by all.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to your success.

team.name: Lesia Payne
team.role: Company Owner And Lead Ux Designer
team.bio: Lesia leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring every project aligns with our mission for beautiful, accessible design.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We start by understanding your needs and goals.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: We create and iterate on design concepts.

process.title: Testing
process.description: We rigorously test the designs for usability and performance.

process.title: Launch & Support
process.description: We launch your site and provide ongoing support.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment option that best suits your needs.

pricing.name: Standard Package
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to improve their online presence.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses ready to expand their digital impact.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Perfect for organizations needing full-scale digital transformation.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a chat about how we can help you reach your goals.

lead.company_description:
We partner for postive change. 

We work with partners whose mission we connect with‚Äîwho are working to make the world better. For the past decade, we have put our time and expertise as designers, developers and UX strategists towards improving our community and giving back wherever we can.

We don't just design websites. We create valuable tools and information that your customers, clients and staff can actually use.

Whether we are doing graphic design or web development, our focus is usability so anyone can find what they are looking for, fast. Putting users first helps them find your website and helps your business grow.

Services include:
Responsive website design
User Experience (UX) design
Wireframing
Art direction
Logo design
Print graphic design
Signage and display design
Business card design
Packaging design
Trade show booth and banner design
Custom web development 
Customized Squarespace Websites
Information Architecture
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
User-testing
Tree testing
QA testing
Website & usability audits
Web applications
Mobile web applications
